thread.section_title: Hotel 41 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely fabulous
thread.title_full: Absolutely fabulous - Review of Hotel 41, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: orchardh2017
title: Absolutely fabulous
text:
Lost for words really. Everything about 41 was wonderful, the service was excellent and the staff so friendly and obliging. The food was great,surroundings beautiful and rooms couldn't have been better. Every little detail had been thought of and we can't wait to treat ourselves to another visit.
Orchard H
